resources.string: Let\'s take care of my paw animals
You can add an image by clicking the button

If you want to help our adorable friends, donate now through THKD! THKD is an association that care and sheltering of animals. Make a donation today and contribute to THKDs efforts in helping stray animals.
To donate, please long press the button.
